7 namespace FullInspector.Internal {
12  public class AbstractTypePropertyEditor : IPropertyEditor, IPropertyEditorEditAPI {
13  private AbstractTypeInstanceOptionManager _options;
14 
15  public AbstractTypePropertyEditor(Type baseType) {
16  _options = new AbstractTypeInstanceOptionManager(baseType);
17  }
18 
19  public PropertyEditorChain EditorChain {
20  get;
21  set;
22  }

24 
25  public object OnSceneGUI(object element) {
26  if (element != null) {
27  PropertyEditorChain chain = PropertyEditor.Get(element.GetType(), null);
28  IPropertyEditor editor = chain.SkipUntilNot(typeof(AbstractTypePropertyEditor));
29 
30  return editor.OnSceneGUI(element);
31  }
32  return element;
33  }
34 
35  public object Edit(Rect region, GUIContent label, object element) {
36  _options.RemoveExtraneousOptions();
37 
38  // draw the popup
39  {
40  int popupHeight = (int)EditorStyles.popup.CalcHeight(GUIContent.none, 100);
41 
42  Rect popupRegion = new Rect(region);
43  popupRegion.height = popupHeight;
44  region.y += popupRegion.height;
45  region.height -= popupRegion.height;
46 
47  int selectedIndex = _options.GetDisplayOptionIndex(element);
48  int updatedIndex = EditorGUI.Popup(popupRegion, label, selectedIndex, _options.GetDisplayOptions());
49 
50  element = _options.UpdateObjectInstance(element, selectedIndex, updatedIndex);
51  }
52 
53  // no element; no editor
54  if (element == null) {
55  return null;
56  }
57 
58  // draw the comment
59  // TODO: move this into ReflectedPropertyEditor, draw the comment above the type
60  {
61  string comment = _options.GetComment(element);
62  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(comment) == false) {
63  Rect commentRegion = CommentUtils.GetCommentRect(comment, region);
64  region.y += commentRegion.height;
65  region.height += commentRegion.height;
66 
67  EditorGUI.HelpBox(commentRegion, comment, MessageType.None);
68  }
69  }
70 
71  // draw the instance specific property editor
72  {
73  Rect selectedRegion = new Rect(region);
74  selectedRegion = RectTools.IndentedRect(selectedRegion);
75  region.y += selectedRegion.height;
76  region.height -= selectedRegion.height;
77 
78  // show custom editor
79  PropertyEditorChain chain = PropertyEditor.Get(element.GetType(), null);
80  IPropertyEditor editor = chain.SkipUntilNot(typeof(AbstractTypePropertyEditor));
81 
82  return editor.Edit(selectedRegion, GUIContent.none, element);
83  }
84  }
85 
86  public float GetElementHeight(GUIContent label, object element) {
87  float height = EditorStyles.popup.CalcHeight(label, 100);
88 
89  string comment = _options.GetComment(element);
90  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(comment) == false) {
91  height += CommentUtils.GetCommentHeight(comment);
92  }
93 
94  if (element != null) {
95  PropertyEditorChain chain = PropertyEditor.Get(element.GetType(), null);
96  IPropertyEditor editor = chain.SkipUntilNot(typeof(AbstractTypePropertyEditor));
97 
98  height += RectTools.IndentVertical;
99  height += editor.GetElementHeight(GUIContent.none, element);
100  }
101 
102  return height;
103  }
104 
105  public GUIContent GetFoldoutHeader(GUIContent label, object element) {
106  return new GUIContent(label.text + " (" + fiReflectionUtilitity.GetObjectTypeNameSafe(element) + ")");
107  }
108 
109  public bool CanEdit(Type dataType) {
110  throw new NotSupportedException();
111  }
112 
113  public static IPropertyEditor TryCreate(Type dataType) {
114  if (dataType.IsAbstract || dataType.IsInterface ||
115  fiReflectionUtilitity.GetCreatableTypesDeriving(dataType).Count() > 1) {
116 
117  return new AbstractTypePropertyEditor(dataType);
118  }
119 
120  return null;
121  }
122  }
123 }
